description:
Regarded as one of the leading law firms in our region for complex civil litigation, The Drakulich Firm, A Professional Law Corporation, in Reno, Nevada, delivers highly personalized counsel and aggressive advocacy to clients who have legal needs involving any of the following:

  • Whistleblower and qui tam claims
  • Product liability
  • Personal injury and wrongful death
  • Bad faith insurance
  • Professional negligence
  • Business litigation and fraud

Together with our additional law office in San Diego, California, we serve a diverse range of clients across both states and beyond who are dealing with highly complex, pressing legal matters that threaten to affect the most important aspects of their lives and businesses. Over the years, we have secured hundreds of millions of dollars in settlements and awards for our plaintiff clients, and we promise to do all we can to help increase your chances of obtaining the maximum amount of compensation for the damages you have incurred.

When you work with our law firm, you will receive the benefit of our decades of combined legal experience. We have also earned a listing in the prestigious Bar Register of Preeminent LawyersTM by Martindale-Hubbell速, so you know that you can trust us with your most sensitive legal matters.

No matter how complex your situation and the goals you wish to achieve, you can rely on the attorneys at The Drakulich Firm, A Professional Law Corporation, to help see you through. To find out more about how we can best assist in securing the justice you deserve, you can call our law office or visit our website to schedule an appointment for a free initial consultation.
